fields.short_description: Astronauts forgot a big bag of doughnuts in the moon, and now we aim to land on the moon and bring them back.
Django app to blah blah blah...

fields.body:
Creamy is the result of the first development cycle of the Lunar Doughnut project. It allows us to test the Space Shuttle and the Doughnut Detector.

Features are:

  * Apache powered engines
  * Java daba doo improved performance
  * Water proof
  * Und so weiter

Release One of the Space Pony project, a Django App to blah blah blah:

Features:

  * Social network disintegration
  * Moderated clamor
  * Search Engine Obfuscation
  * Etc

This app requires Django-3D-glasses and Django-Popcorn.

The Release Two of the Space Pony project improves This and That. It also boosts your moral and reduces your self decadence.

Highlighted features:

  * Complete nonsense all over the code
  * Monkey patched unittests results
  * HTML6 support right from the __future__
  * Soon in your cinema

Important: This app doesn't work with peanut oil!
